page.title: 10ALLENDALE MIDDLE SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is called Allendale Middle School and was built in 1959. It is mainly built of sandstone and slate.There are 190 pupils at the school. There are 6 general classrooms and 1 laboratory ,1 workshop , 1 homecraft room , a French room and the hall which is used for P.E , games and school lunches. The school has a football pitch , a hockey pitch, 2 netball courts and a long jump pit.There is also a green house which is very well looked after. The children who attend the school are aged between 9 and 13 and come from Haydon Bridge , Carrshield , Whitfield , Allendale , Catton and Allenheads. There are 14 full time teachers.
